Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Dad \Dad\ (d[a^]d), n. [Prob. of Celtic origin; cf. Ir. daid, Gael. daidein, W. tad, OL. tata, Gr. ta`ta, te`tta, Skr. t[=a]ta.] Father; -- a word sometimes used by children. [1913 Webster]
I was never so bethumped with words, Since I first called my brother's father dad. --Shak. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: Virtual Entity of Relevant Acronyms (Version 1.9, June 2002)

Definition.WordDefinition: dad n : an informal term for a father; probably derived from baby talk [syn: {dada}, {daddy}, {pa}, {papa}, {pappa}, {pater}, {pop}]
